description:
KDE Plasma 6.3.2 is now available as the second maintenance update to the latest KDE Plasma 6.3 desktop environment series with more bug fixes and other improvements.

The post KDE Plasma 6.3.2 Released with Animated WebP and GIF Support for Spectacle appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
title: KDE Plasma 6.3.2 Released with Animated WebP and GIF Support for Spectacle
